attributes.action: Raise the minium sentence for murder using a knife to a 25 year tariff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to raise the minimum sentence for being in possesion of a knife and for  murder using a knife to a 25 year prison term, as soon as practicable. Furthermore we call for the introduction of tougher penalties for individuals caught with a knife or offensive weapon and call on authorities to raise awareness of youth knife crime through ongoing campaigns urging people to ‘dump the knife and save a life.’
